title: AI Technology Revolutionizes Kenyan Agriculture
content: Farmers in Kenya are now using AI-powered drones to monitor crop health and predict yields more accurately.

title: Kenya Launches New Renewable Energy Project
content: A new solar energy project aims to provide clean energy to 50,000 households across Kenya.

title: Mobile Payment Innovations in East Africa
content: Mobile payment platforms continue to grow, making financial services more accessible to rural areas.
